document.full_text: the u.s. health regulator ordered painkiller makers to provide educational materials to help train physicians about the correct use of the drugs, as part of the obama administration's plan to tackle prescription drug abuse.
document.title: fda unveils new action on prescription drug abuse
lines_and_colors: the u.s. health regulator ordered painkiller makers to provide educational materials to help train physicians about the correct use of the drugs, as part of the obama administration's plan to tackle prescription drug abuse.
